00349 BOOLEAN EnterBobbyRMailOrder()
00350 {
00351   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00352       UINT16                              i;
00353       
00354       gfReDrawBobbyOrder = FALSE;
00355       gfDrawConfirmOrderGrpahic = FALSE;
00356       gfDestroyConfirmGrphiArea = FALSE;
00357       gfCanAcceptOrder = TRUE;
00358       gubDropDownAction = BR_DROP_DOWN_NO_ACTION;
00359 
00360       gShippingSpeedAreas[0] = iScreenWidthOffset + 585;
00361       gShippingSpeedAreas[1] = iScreenHeightOffset + 218 + LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_DELTA_Y;
00362       gShippingSpeedAreas[2] = iScreenWidthOffset + 585;
00363       gShippingSpeedAreas[3] = iScreenHeightOffset + 238 + LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_DELTA_Y;
00364       gShippingSpeedAreas[4] = iScreenWidthOffset + 585;
00365       gShippingSpeedAreas[5] = iScreenHeightOffset + 258 + LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_DELTA_Y;
00366 
00367       // load the Order Grid graphic and add it
00368       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00369       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\BobbyOrderGrid.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00370       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiBobbyROrderGrid));
00371 
00372       // load the Location graphic and add it
00373       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00374       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\BobbyLocationBox.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00375       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiBobbyRLocationGraphic));
00376 
00377       // load the delivery speed graphic and add it
00378       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00379       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\BobbyDeliverySpeed.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00380       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiDeliverySpeedGraphic));
00381 
00382       // load the delivery speed graphic and add it
00383       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00384       GetMLGFilename( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, MLG_CONFIRMORDER );
00385       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiConfirmGraphic));
00386 
00387       // load the delivery speed graphic and add it
00388       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00389       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\TotalSaveArea.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00390       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiTotalSaveArea));
00391 
00392   // border
00393   VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00394       FilenameForBPP( "INTERFACE\\TactPopUp.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile );
00395       CHECKF( AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &guiDropDownBorder ) );
00396 
00397   // Gold Arrow for the scroll area
00398   VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00399       FilenameForBPP( "LAPTOP\\GoldArrows.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile );
00400       CHECKF( AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &guiGoldArrowImages ) );
00401 
00402   // Package Weight Graphic
00403   VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00404       FilenameForBPP( "LAPTOP\\PackageWeight.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile );
00405       CHECKF( AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &guiPackageWeightImage       ) );
00406 
00407 
00408       InitBobbyRWoodBackground();
00409

00411       //Init the button areas
00412       //
00413 
00414       // Clear Order button
00415       guiBobbyRClearOrderImage = LoadButtonImage("LAPTOP\\EraseOrderButton.sti", -1,0,-1,1,-1 );
00416       guiBobbyRClearOrder = CreateIconAndTextButton( guiBobbyRClearOrderImage, BobbyROrderFormText[BOBBYR_CLEAR_ORDER], BOBBYR_ORDER_TITLE_TEXT_FONT, 
00417                                                                                BOBBYR_GUNS_TEXT_COLOR_ON, BOBBYR_GUNS_SHADOW_COLOR, 
00418                                                                                BOBBYR_GUNS_TEXT_COLOR_OFF, BOBBYR_GUNS_SHADOW_COLOR, 
00419                                                                                TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00420                                                                                BOBBYR_CLEAR_ORDER_X, BOBBYR_CLEAR_ORDER_Y+4, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00421                                                                                DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnBobbyRClearOrderCallback);
00422       SetButtonCursor(guiBobbyRClearOrder, CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN);
00423       SpecifyDisabledButtonStyle( guiBobbyRClearOrder, DISABLED_STYLE_NONE );
00424       SpecifyButtonTextOffsets( guiBobbyRClearOrder, 39, 10, TRUE );
00425 
00426 
00427       // Accept Order button
00428       guiBobbyRAcceptOrderImage = LoadButtonImage("LAPTOP\\AcceptOrderButton.sti", 2,0,-1,1,-1 );
00429       guiBobbyRAcceptOrder = CreateIconAndTextButton( guiBobbyRAcceptOrderImage, BobbyROrderFormText[BOBBYR_ACCEPT_ORDER], BOBBYR_ORDER_TITLE_TEXT_FONT, 
00430                                                                                BOBBYR_GUNS_TEXT_COLOR_ON, BOBBYR_GUNS_SHADOW_COLOR, 
00431                                                                                BOBBYR_GUNS_TEXT_COLOR_OFF, BOBBYR_GUNS_SHADOW_COLOR, 
00432                                                                                TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00433                                                                                BOBBYR_ACCEPT_ORDER_X, BOBBYR_ACCEPT_ORDER_Y+4, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00434                                                                                DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnBobbyRAcceptOrderCallback);
00435       SetButtonCursor( guiBobbyRAcceptOrder, CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN);

00441             DisableButton( guiBobbyRAcceptOrder );
00442 
00443       //if there is anything to buy, dont disable the accept button
00444 //    if( !IsAnythingPurchasedFromBobbyRayPage() )
00445       {
00446 //          DisableButton( guiBobbyRAcceptOrder );
00447       }
00448 
00449

00452                                                                                BOBBYR_GUNS_TEXT_COLOR_ON, BOBBYR_GUNS_SHADOW_COLOR,

00457       SetButtonCursor(guiBobbyRBack, CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN);

00461                                                                                BOBBYR_GUNS_TEXT_COLOR_ON, BOBBYR_GUNS_SHADOW_COLOR,

00498                                            CURSOR_WWW, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, SelectActivateCityDroDownRegionCallBack);

00500 
00501

00504                                            CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, SelectCloseDroDownRegionCallBack); 
00505       MSYS_AddRegion(&gSelectedCloseDropDownRegion); 
00506   MSYS_DisableRegion(&gSelectedCloseDropDownRegion); 
00507 
00508 
00509       CreateBobbyRayOrderTitle();
00510 
00511       guiShippingCost = 0;
00512       
00513       gfRemoveItemsFromStock = FALSE;
00514 
00515       RenderBobbyRMailOrder();
00516       return(TRUE);
00517 }
00518 
00519 void ExitBobbyRMailOrder()
00520 {
00521       UINT16 i;
00522 
00523       //if we are to remove the items from stock
00524       if( gfRemoveItemsFromStock )
00525       {
00526             //Remove the items for Boby Rqys Inventory
00527             RemovePurchasedItemsFromBobbyRayInventory();
00528       }
00529       
00530 
00531       DestroyBobbyROrderTitle();
00532 
00533       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiBobbyROrderGrid);
00534       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiBobbyRLocationGraphic);
00535       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiDeliverySpeedGraphic);
00536       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiConfirmGraphic);
00537       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiTotalSaveArea);
00538       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiDropDownBorder);
00539       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiGoldArrowImages);
00540       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiPackageWeightImage);
00541 
00542 
00543       UnloadButtonImage( guiBobbyRClearOrderImage );
00544       RemoveButton( guiBobbyRClearOrder );
00545 
00546       UnloadButtonImage( guiBobbyRAcceptOrderImage );
00547       RemoveButton( guiBobbyRAcceptOrder );
00548 
00549       UnloadButtonImage( guiBobbyRBackImage );
00550       RemoveButton( guiBobbyRBack );
00551 
00552       UnloadButtonImage( giBobbyRGotoShipmentPageImage );
00553       RemoveButton( guiBobbyRGotoShipmentPage );
00554 
00555       RemoveButton( guiBobbyRHome );
00556       UnloadButtonImage( guiBobbyRHomeImage );
00557 
00558       DeleteBobbyRWoodBackground();
00559 
00560       for(i=0; i<3; i++)
00561       {
00562         MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSelectedShippingSpeedRegion[i]);
00563       }
00564 
00565   MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSelectedConfirmOrderRegion);
00566   MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSelectedActivateCityDroDownRegion);
00567   MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSelectedCloseDropDownRegion);
00568 
00569 
00570       //if the drop down box is active, destroy it
00571       gubDropDownAction = BR_DROP_DOWN_DESTROY;
00572       CreateDestroyBobbyRDropDown( BR_DROP_DOWN_DESTROY );
00573 }
00574 
00575 void HandleBobbyRMailOrder()
00576 {
00577       if( gfReDrawBobbyOrder )
00578       {
00579 //          RenderBobbyRMailOrder();
00580             fPausedReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
00581             gfReDrawBobbyOrder = FALSE;
00582       }
00583 
00584       if(   gfDrawConfirmOrderGrpahic )
00585       {
00586             HVOBJECT hPixHandle;
00587 
00588             // Bobbyray title
00589             GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiConfirmGraphic);
00590             BltVideoObjectOutlineShadowFromIndex( FRAME_BUFFER, guiConfirmGraphic, 0, BOBBYR_CONFIRM_ORDER_X+3, BOBBYR_CONFIRM_ORDER_Y+3);
00591 
00592             BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0, BOBBYR_CONFIRM_ORDER_X, BOBBYR_CONFIRM_ORDER_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00593         InvalidateRegion(LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y,LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_LR_Y);
00594 
00595             gfDrawConfirmOrderGrpahic = FALSE;
00596       }
00597 
00598       if( gfDestroyConfirmGrphiArea )
00599       {
00600             gfDestroyConfirmGrphiArea = FALSE;
00601             gfReDrawBobbyOrder = TRUE;
00602         MSYS_DisableRegion(&gSelectedConfirmOrderRegion); 
00603             gfCanAcceptOrder = TRUE;
00604       }
00605 
00606       if( gubDropDownAction != BR_DROP_DOWN_NO_ACTION )
00607       {
00608             CreateDestroyBobbyRDropDown( gubDropDownAction );
00609 
00610             if( gubDropDownAction == BR_DROP_DOWN_CREATE )
00611                   gubDropDownAction = BR_DROP_DOWN_DISPLAY;
00612             else
00613                   gubDropDownAction = BR_DROP_DOWN_NO_ACTION;
00614       }
00615 
00616 }

00723 
00724 void BtnBobbyRClearOrderCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00725 {
00726       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00727       {
00728             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00729             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00730       }
00731       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00732       {
00733             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00734 
00735             memset(&BobbyRayPurchases, 0, sizeof(BobbyRayPurchaseStruct) * MAX_PURCHASE_AMOUNT);
00736             gubSelectedLight = 0;
00737             gfReDrawBobbyOrder = TRUE;
00738             gbSelectedCity = -1;
00739             gubCityAtTopOfList = 0;
00740 
00741             //Get rid of the city drop dowm, if it is being displayed
00742             gubDropDownAction = BR_DROP_DOWN_DESTROY;
00743 
00744             //disable the accept order button
00745             DisableButton( guiBobbyRAcceptOrder );
00746 
00747             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00748       }
00749       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
00750       {
00751             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00752             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00753       }
00754 } 
00755 
00756 
00757 void BtnBobbyRAcceptOrderCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00758 {
00759       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00760       {
00761             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
00762             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00763       }
00764       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00765       {
00766             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00767 
00768             if( guiSubTotal && gfCanAcceptOrder )
00769             {
00770                   //if the player doesnt have enough money
00771                   if( LaptopSaveInfo.iCurrentBalance < giGrandTotal )
00772                   {
00773                         DoLapTopMessageBox( MSG_BOX_LAPTOP_DEFAULT, BobbyROrderFormText[BOBBYR_CANT_AFFORD_PURCHASE], LAPTOP_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL);
00774                   }
00775                   else
00776                   {
00777                         wchar_t     zTemp[ 128 ];
00778 
00779                         //if the city is Drassen, and the airport sector is player controlled
00780                         if( gbSelectedCity == BR_DRASSEN && !StrategicMap[ SECTOR_INFO_TO_STRATEGIC_INDEX( SEC_B13 ) ].fEnemyControlled )
00781                         {
00782                               //Quick hack to bypass the confirmation box
00783                               ConfirmBobbyRPurchaseMessageBoxCallBack( MSG_BOX_RETURN_YES );
00784                         }
00785                         else
00786                         {
00787                               //else pop up a confirmation box
00788                               swprintf( zTemp, BobbyROrderFormText[BOBBYR_CONFIRM_DEST],  *BobbyROrderLocations[gbSelectedCity].psCityLoc );
00789                               DoLapTopMessageBox( MSG_BOX_LAPTOP_DEFAULT, zTemp, LAPTOP_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNO, ConfirmBobbyRPurchaseMessageBoxCallBack );
00790                         }
00791 
00792 /*                      //if the shipment is going to Drassen, add the inventory
00793                         if( gbSelectedCity == BR_DRASSEN )
00794                         {
00795 //                            BobbyRayOrderStruct *pBobbyRayPurchase;
00796 //                            UINT32      uiResetTimeSec;
00797                               UINT8 i, ubCount;
00798                               UINT8 cnt;
00799                               INT8        bDaysAhead;
00800 
00801                               //if we need to add more array elements for the Order Array
00802                               if( LaptopSaveInfo.usNumberOfBobbyRayOrderItems <= LaptopSaveInfo.usNumberOfBobbyRayOrderUsed )
00803                               {
00804                                     LaptopSaveInfo.usNumberOfBobbyRayOrderItems++;
00805                                     LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayOrdersOnDeliveryArray = MemRealloc( LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayOrdersOnDeliveryArray, sizeof( BobbyRayOrderStruct ) * LaptopSaveInfo.usNumberOfBobbyRayOrderItems );
00806                                     if( LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayOrdersOnDeliveryArray == NULL )
00807                                           return;
00808 
00809                                     memset( &LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayOrdersOnDeliveryArray[ LaptopSaveInfo.usNumberOfBobbyRayOrderItems - 1 ], 0, sizeof( BobbyRayOrderStruct ) );
00810                               }
00811 
00812                               for( cnt =0; cnt< LaptopSaveInfo.usNumberOfBobbyRayOrderItems; cnt++ )
00813                               {
00814                                     //get an empty element in the array
00815                                     if( !LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayOrdersOnDeliveryArray[ cnt ].fActive )
00816                                           break;
00817                               }
00818 
00819                               //gets reset when the confirm order graphic disappears
00820                               gfCanAcceptOrder = FALSE;
00821 
00822 //                            pBobbyRayPurchase = MemAlloc( sizeof( BobbyRayOrderStruct ) );
00823 //                            memset(pBobbyRayPurchase, 0, sizeof( BobbyRayOrderStruct ) );
00824 
00825 
00826                               ubCount = 0;
00827                               for(i=0; i<MAX_PURCHASE_AMOUNT; i++)
00828                               {
00829                                     //if the item was purchased
00830                                     if( BobbyRayPurchases[ i ].ubNumberPurchased )
00831                                     {
00832                                           //copy the purchases into the struct that will be added to the queue
00833                                           memcpy(&LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayOrdersOnDeliveryArray[ cnt ].BobbyRayPurchase[ ubCount ] , &BobbyRayPurchases[i],  sizeof(BobbyRayPurchaseStruct));
00834                                           ubCount ++;
00835                                     }
00836                               }
00837 
00838                               LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayOrdersOnDeliveryArray[ cnt ].ubNumberPurchases = ubCount;
00839                               LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayOrdersOnDeliveryArray[ cnt ].fActive = TRUE;
00840                               LaptopSaveInfo.usNumberOfBobbyRayOrderUsed++;
00841 
00842                               //get the length of time to receive the shipment                  
00843                               if( gubSelectedLight == 0 )
00844                               {
00845                                     bDaysAhead = OVERNIGHT_EXPRESS;
00846                                     //uiResetTimeSec = GetMidnightOfFutureDayInMinutes( OVERNIGHT_EXPRESS );
00847                               }
00848                               else if( gubSelectedLight == 1 )
00849                               {
00850                                     bDaysAhead = TWO_BUSINESS_DAYS;
00851                                     //uiResetTimeSec = GetMidnightOfFutureDayInMinutes( TWO_BUSINESS_DAYS );
00852                               }
00853                               else if( gubSelectedLight == 2 )
00854                               {
00855                                     bDaysAhead = STANDARD_SERVICE;
00856                                     //uiResetTimeSec = GetMidnightOfFutureDayInMinutes( STANDARD_SERVICE );
00857                               }
00858                               else
00859                               {
00860                                     bDaysAhead = 0;
00861                                     //uiResetTimeSec = 0;
00862                               }
00863                               
00864                               if (gMercProfiles[99].bLife == 0)
00865                               {
00866                                     // Sal is dead, so Pablo is dead, so the airport is badly run
00867                                     bDaysAhead += (UINT8) Random( 5 ) + 1;
00868                               }
00869 
00870                               //add a random amount between so it arrives between 8:00 am and noon
00871                               //uiResetTimeSec += (8 + Random(4) ) * 60;
00872 
00873                               //AddStrategicEvent( EVENT_BOBBYRAY_PURCHASE, uiResetTimeSec, cnt);
00874                               AddFutureDayStrategicEvent( EVENT_BOBBYRAY_PURCHASE, (8 + Random(4) ) * 60, cnt, bDaysAhead );
00875 
00876                         }
00877 
00878                         //Add the transaction to the finance page
00879                         AddTransactionToPlayersBook(BOBBYR_PURCHASE, 0, GetWorldTotalMin(), -giGrandTotal);
00880                   
00881                         //display the confirm order graphic
00882                         gfDrawConfirmOrderGrpahic = TRUE;
00883 
00884                         //Get rid of the city drop dowm, if it is being displayed
00885                         gubDropDownAction = BR_DROP_DOWN_DESTROY;
00886 
00887                         MSYS_EnableRegion(&gSelectedConfirmOrderRegion); 
00888 */
00889                   }
00890             }
00891 
00892             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00893       }
00894       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
00895       {
00896             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00897             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
00898       }
00899 } 
00900 
00901 
00902 void DisplayPurchasedItems( BOOLEAN fCalledFromOrderPage, UINT16 usGridX, UINT16 usGridY, BobbyRayPurchaseStruct *pBobbyRayPurchase, BOOLEAN fJustDisplayTitles, INT32 iOrderNum )
00903 {
00904       UINT16      i,j;
00905       wchar_t     sText[400];
00906       wchar_t     sBack[400];
00907       wchar_t     sTemp[20];
00908       UINT16      usPosY;
00909       UINT32      uiStartLoc=0;
00910       UINT32      uiTotal;
00911       UINT16      usStringLength;
00912       UINT16      usPixLength;
00913       wchar_t     OneChar[2];
00914       INT32       iGrandTotal;
00915       INT32       iSubTotal;
00916 
00917 
00918 
00919       //Output the qty
00920       DrawTextToScreen(BobbyROrderFormText[BOBBYR_QTY], (UINT16)(usGridX+BOBBYR_GRID_FIRST_COLUMN_X), (UINT16)(usGridY+BOBBYR_GRID_FIRST_COLUMN_Y-BOBBYR_GRID_TITLE_OFFSET), BOBBYR_GRID_FIRST_COLUMN_WIDTH, BOBBYR_ORDER_STATIC_TEXT_FONT, BOBBYR_ORDER_STATIC_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00921 
00922       //Create a string for the weight ( %s ) ( where %s is the weight string, either kg or lbs )
00923       swprintf( sTemp, BobbyROrderFormText[BOBBYR_WEIGHT], GetWeightUnitString( ) );
00924 
00925       //Output the Weight
00926       DisplayWrappedString((UINT16)(usGridX+BOBBYR_GRID_SECOND_COLUMN_X), (UINT16)(usGridY+BOBBYR_GRID_SECOND_COLUMN_Y-30), BOBBYR_GRID_SECOND_COLUMN_WIDTH, 2, BOBBYR_ORDER_STATIC_TEXT_FONT, BOBBYR_ORDER_STATIC_TEXT_COLOR, sTemp, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
00927 
00928       //Output the name
00929       DrawTextToScreen(BobbyROrderFormText[BOBBYR_NAME], (UINT16)(usGridX+BOBBYR_GRID_THIRD_COLUMN_X), (UINT16)(usGridY+BOBBYR_GRID_THIRD_COLUMN_Y-BOBBYR_GRID_TITLE_OFFSET), BOBBYR_GRID_THIRD_COLUMN_WIDTH, BOBBYR_ORDER_STATIC_TEXT_FONT, BOBBYR_ORDER_STATIC_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00930 
00931       //Output the unit price
00932       DisplayWrappedString((UINT16)(usGridX+BOBBYR_GRID_FOURTH_COLUMN_X), (UINT16)(usGridY+BOBBYR_GRID_FOURTH_COLUMN_Y-30), BOBBYR_GRID_FOURTH_COLUMN_WIDTH, 2, BOBBYR_ORDER_STATIC_TEXT_FONT, BOBBYR_ORDER_STATIC_TEXT_COLOR, BobbyROrderFormText[BOBBYR_UNIT_PRICE], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00933 
00934       //Output the total
00935       DrawTextToScreen(BobbyROrderFormText[BOBBYR_TOTAL], (UINT16)(usGridX+BOBBYR_GRID_FIFTH_COLUMN_X), (UINT16)(usGridY+BOBBYR_GRID_FIFTH_COLUMN_Y-BOBBYR_GRID_TITLE_OFFSET), BOBBYR_GRID_FIFTH_COLUMN_WIDTH, BOBBYR_ORDER_STATIC_TEXT_FONT, BOBBYR_ORDER_STATIC_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
00936 
00937       //Output the sub total, shipping and handling, and the grand total
00938       DrawTextToScreen(BobbyROrderFormText[BOBBYR_SUB_TOTAL], (UINT16)(usGridX+BOBBYR_SUBTOTAL_X), (UINT16)(usGridY+BOBBYR_SUBTOTAL_Y), BOBBYR_SUBTOTAL_WIDTH, BOBBYR_ORDER_STATIC_TEXT_FONT, BOBBYR_ORDER_STATIC_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, RIGHT_JUSTIFIED);
00939       DrawTextToScreen(BobbyROrderFormText[BOBBYR_S_H], (UINT16)(usGridX+BOBBYR_SUBTOTAL_X), (UINT16)(usGridY+BOBBYR_SHIPPING_N_HANDLE_Y), BOBBYR_SUBTOTAL_WIDTH, BOBBYR_ORDER_STATIC_TEXT_FONT, BOBBYR_ORDER_STATIC_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, RIGHT_JUSTIFIED);
00940       DrawTextToScreen(BobbyROrderFormText[BOBBYR_GRAND_TOTAL], (UINT16)(usGridX+BOBBYR_SUBTOTAL_X), (UINT16)(usGridY+BOBBYR_GRAND_TOTAL_Y), BOBBYR_SUBTOTAL_WIDTH, BOBBYR_ORDER_STATIC_TEXT_FONT, BOBBYR_ORDER_STATIC_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, RIGHT_JUSTIFIED);
00941 
00942 
00943       if( fJustDisplayTitles )
00944       {
00945             return;
00946       }
00947 
00948       if( fCalledFromOrderPage )
00949       {
00950             guiSubTotal = 0;
00951             giGrandTotal = 0;
00952       }
00953       else
00954       {
00955             iSubTotal = 0;
00956             iGrandTotal = 0;
00957       }
00958 
00959 
00960       if( pBobbyRayPurchase == NULL )
00961       {
00962             return;
00963       }
00964 
00965       //loop through the array of purchases to display only the items that are purchased
00966       usPosY = usGridY+BOBBYR_GRID_FIRST_COLUMN_Y + 4;
00967       for(i=0; i<MAX_PURCHASE_AMOUNT; i++)
00968       {
00969             //if the item was purchased
00970 //          if( BobbyRayPurchases[ i ].ubNumberPurchased )
00971             if( pBobbyRayPurchase[i].ubNumberPurchased )    
00972             {
00973                   uiTotal = 0;
00974 
00975                   //Display the qty, order#, item name, unit price and the total
00976 
00977                   //qty
00978                   swprintf(sTemp, L"%3d", pBobbyRayPurchase[i].ubNumberPurchased );
00979                   DrawTextToScreen(sTemp, (UINT16)(usGridX+BOBBYR_GRID_FIRST_COLUMN_X-2), usPosY, BOBBYR_GRID_FIRST_COLUMN_WIDTH, BOBBYR_ORDER_DYNAMIC_TEXT_FONT, BOBBYR_ORDER_DYNAMIC_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, RIGHT_JUSTIFIED);
00980 
00981                   //weight
00982                   swprintf( sTemp, L"%3.1f", GetWeightBasedOnMetricOption( Item[ pBobbyRayPurchase[i].usItemIndex ].ubWeight ) / (FLOAT)( 10.0 ) * pBobbyRayPurchase[i].ubNumberPurchased );
00983                   DrawTextToScreen(sTemp, (UINT16)(usGridX+BOBBYR_GRID_SECOND_COLUMN_X-2), usPosY, BOBBYR_GRID_SECOND_COLUMN_WIDTH, BOBBYR_ORDER_DYNAMIC_TEXT_FONT, BOBBYR_ORDER_DYNAMIC_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, RIGHT_JUSTIFIED);
00984 
00985                   //Display Items Name
00986                   if( pBobbyRayPurchase[i].fUsed )
00987                   {
00988                         uiStartLoc = BOBBYR_ITEM_DESC_FILE_SIZE * LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayUsedInventory[ pBobbyRayPurchase[i].usBobbyItemIndex ].usItemIndex;
00989                   }
00990                   else
00991                   {
00992                         uiStartLoc = BOBBYR_ITEM_DESC_FILE_SIZE * LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayInventory[ pBobbyRayPurchase[i].usBobbyItemIndex ].usItemIndex;
00993                   }
00994 
00995 
00996                   if( pBobbyRayPurchase[i].fUsed )
00997                   {
00998 //                      LoadEncryptedDataFromFile(BOBBYRDESCFILE, sBack, uiStartLoc, BOBBYR_ITEM_DESC_NAME_SIZE);
00999                         LoadBRName(pBobbyRayPurchase[i].usItemIndex,sBack);
01000                         swprintf(sText, L"%s %s", "*", sBack);
01001                   }
01002                   else
01003                         LoadBRName(pBobbyRayPurchase[i].usItemIndex,sText);
01004 //                      LoadEncryptedDataFromFile(BOBBYRDESCFILE, sText, uiStartLoc, BOBBYR_ITEM_DESC_NAME_SIZE);
01005 
01006                   //if the name is bigger then can fit into the slot, reduce the size
01007                   if( StringPixLength(sText, BOBBYR_ORDER_DYNAMIC_TEXT_FONT) > BOBBYR_GRID_THIRD_COLUMN_WIDTH-4 )
01008                   {
01009                         usStringLength = wcslen(sText);
01010                         usPixLength=0;
01011                         OneChar[1] = L'\0';
01012                         for(j=0; (i<usStringLength)&&(usPixLength < BOBBYR_GRID_THIRD_COLUMN_WIDTH-16); j++)
01013                         {
01014                               sBack[j] = sText[j];
01015                               OneChar[0] = sBack[j];
01016                               usPixLength += StringPixLength(OneChar, BOBBYR_ORDER_DYNAMIC_TEXT_FONT);
01017                         }
01018                         sBack[j] = 0;
01019                         swprintf(sText, L"%s...", sBack);
01020                   }
01021 
01022                   DrawTextToScreen(sText, (UINT16)(usGridX+BOBBYR_GRID_THIRD_COLUMN_X+2), usPosY, BOBBYR_GRID_THIRD_COLUMN_WIDTH, BOBBYR_ORDER_DYNAMIC_TEXT_FONT, BOBBYR_ORDER_DYNAMIC_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
01023 
01024                   //unit price
01025                   swprintf(sTemp, L"%d", CalcBobbyRayCost( pBobbyRayPurchase[i].usItemIndex, pBobbyRayPurchase[i].usBobbyItemIndex, pBobbyRayPurchase[i].fUsed ));
01026                   InsertCommasForDollarFigure( sTemp );
01027                   InsertDollarSignInToString( sTemp );
01028 
01029                   DrawTextToScreen(sTemp, (UINT16)(usGridX+BOBBYR_GRID_FOURTH_COLUMN_X-2), usPosY, BOBBYR_GRID_FOURTH_COLUMN_WIDTH, BOBBYR_ORDER_DYNAMIC_TEXT_FONT, BOBBYR_ORDER_DYNAMIC_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, RIGHT_JUSTIFIED);
01030 
01031                   uiTotal += CalcBobbyRayCost( pBobbyRayPurchase[i].usItemIndex, pBobbyRayPurchase[i].usBobbyItemIndex, pBobbyRayPurchase[i].fUsed ) * pBobbyRayPurchase[i].ubNumberPurchased;
01032 
01033                   swprintf(sTemp, L"%d", uiTotal );
01034                   InsertCommasForDollarFigure( sTemp );
01035                   InsertDollarSignInToString( sTemp );
01036 
01037                   DrawTextToScreen(sTemp, (UINT16)(usGridX+BOBBYR_GRID_FIFTH_COLUMN_X-2), usPosY, BOBBYR_GRID_FIFTH_COLUMN_WIDTH, BOBBYR_ORDER_DYNAMIC_TEXT_FONT, BOBBYR_ORDER_DYNAMIC_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, RIGHT_JUSTIFIED);
01038 
01039                   //add the current item total to the sub total
01040                   if( fCalledFromOrderPage )
01041                   {
01042                         guiSubTotal += uiTotal;
01043                   }
01044                   else
01045                   {
01046                         iSubTotal += uiTotal;
01047                   }
01048 
01049                   usPosY += BOBBYR_GRID_ROW_OFFSET;
01050             }
01051       }
01052 
01053       DisplayShippingCosts( fCalledFromOrderPage, iSubTotal, usGridX, usGridY, iOrderNum );
01054 }
01055 
01056 
01057 void DisplayShippingCosts( BOOLEAN fCalledFromOrderPage, INT32 iSubTotal, UINT16 usGridX, UINT16 usGridY, INT32 iOrderNum )
01058 {
01059       wchar_t     sTemp[20];
01060       HVOBJECT hPixHandle;
01061       INT32 iShippingCost = 0;
01062 //    INT32 iTotal;
01063 
01064       if( fCalledFromOrderPage )
01065       {           
01066             iSubTotal = guiSubTotal;
01067 //          iTotal = giGrandTotal;
01068 
01069             if( gubSelectedLight == 0 )
01070                   guiShippingCost = CalcCostFromWeightOfPackage( 0 );
01071             else if( gubSelectedLight == 1 )
01072                   guiShippingCost = CalcCostFromWeightOfPackage( 1 );
01073             else if( gubSelectedLight == 2 )
01074                   guiShippingCost = CalcCostFromWeightOfPackage( 2 );
01075 
01076             iShippingCost = guiShippingCost;
01077       }
01078       else
01079       {
01080             UINT16      usStandardCost;
01081 
01082             switch( gpNewBobbyrShipments[ iOrderNum ].ubDeliveryMethod )
01083             {
01084                   case 0:
01085                         usStandardCost = BobbyROrderLocations[gpNewBobbyrShipments[ iOrderNum ].ubDeliveryLoc].usOverNightExpress;
01086                         break;
01087                   case 1:
01088                         usStandardCost = BobbyROrderLocations[gpNewBobbyrShipments[ iOrderNum ].ubDeliveryLoc].us2DaysService;
01089                         break;
01090                   case 2:
01091                         usStandardCost = BobbyROrderLocations[gpNewBobbyrShipments[ iOrderNum ].ubDeliveryLoc].usStandardService;
01092                         break;
01093 
01094                   default:
01095                         usStandardCost = 0;
01096             }
01097 
01098             iShippingCost = (INT32)( ( gpNewBobbyrShipments[ iOrderNum ].uiPackageWeight / (FLOAT)10 ) * usStandardCost + .5 );
01099       }
01100 
01101 
01102       //erase the old area
01103       // bli the total Saved area onto the grid
01104       if( fCalledFromOrderPage )
01105       {           
01106             GetVideoObject(&hPixHandle, guiTotalSaveArea);
01107         BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPixHandle, 0, BOBBYR_TOTAL_SAVED_AREA_X, BOBBYR_TOTAL_SAVED_AREA_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
01108       }
01109 
01110       
01111 //if there is a shipment, display the s&h charge
01112       if( iSubTotal )
01113       {
01114             //Display the subtotal
01115             swprintf(sTemp, L"%d", iSubTotal );
01116             InsertCommasForDollarFigure( sTemp );
01117             InsertDollarSignInToString( sTemp );
01118 
01119             DrawTextToScreen(sTemp, (UINT16)(usGridX + BOBBYR_GRID_FIFTH_COLUMN_X-2), (UINT16)(usGridY + BOBBYR_SUBTOTAL_Y), BOBBYR_GRID_FIFTH_COLUMN_WIDTH, BOBBYR_ORDER_DYNAMIC_TEXT_FONT, BOBBYR_ORDER_DYNAMIC_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, RIGHT_JUSTIFIED);
01120 
01121             //Display the shipping and handling charge
01122             swprintf(sTemp, L"%d", iShippingCost );
01123             InsertCommasForDollarFigure( sTemp );
01124             InsertDollarSignInToString( sTemp );
01125 
01126             DrawTextToScreen(sTemp, (UINT16)(usGridX + BOBBYR_GRID_FIFTH_COLUMN_X-2), (UINT16)(usGridY + BOBBYR_SHIPPING_N_HANDLE_Y), BOBBYR_GRID_FIFTH_COLUMN_WIDTH, BOBBYR_ORDER_DYNAMIC_TEXT_FONT, BOBBYR_ORDER_DYNAMIC_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, RIGHT_JUSTIFIED);
01127       
01128 
01129             //Display the grand total
01130             giGrandTotal = iSubTotal + iShippingCost;
01131             swprintf(sTemp, L"%d", giGrandTotal );
01132             InsertCommasForDollarFigure( sTemp );
01133             InsertDollarSignInToString( sTemp );
01134 
01135             DrawTextToScreen(sTemp, (UINT16)(usGridX + BOBBYR_GRID_FIFTH_COLUMN_X-2), (UINT16)(usGridY + BOBBYR_GRAND_TOTAL_Y), BOBBYR_GRID_FIFTH_COLUMN_WIDTH, BOBBYR_ORDER_DYNAMIC_TEXT_FONT, BOBBYR_ORDER_DYNAMIC_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, RIGHT_JUSTIFIED);
01136       }
01137 
01138   InvalidateRegion(iScreenWidthOffset + 333,iScreenHeightOffset + 326,iScreenWidthOffset + 374,iScreenHeightOffset + 400);    
01139 }

01144 void BtnBobbyRBackCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
01145 {
01146       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
01147       {
01148             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
01149             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01150       }
01151       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
01152       {
01153             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
01154             guiCurrentLaptopMode = guiLastBobbyRayPage;
01155             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01156       }
01157       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
01158       {
01159             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
01160             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01161       }
01162 }

01164 
01165 void BtnBobbyRHomeCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
01166 {
01167       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
01168       {
01169             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
01170             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01171       }
01172       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
01173       {
01174             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
01175             guiCurrentLaptopMode  = LAPTOP_MODE_BOBBY_R;
01176             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01177       }
01178       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
01179       {
01180             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
01181             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01182       }
01183 }

01185 void SelectShippingSpeedRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
01186 { 
01187       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
01188       {
01189       }
01190       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
01191       {
01192             gubSelectedLight = (UINT8)MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
01193             DrawShippingSpeedLights( gubSelectedLight );
01194             DisplayShippingCosts( TRUE, 0, BOBBYR_ORDERGRID_X, BOBBYR_ORDERGRID_Y, -1 );
01195       } 
01196 }
01197 
01198 BOOLEAN DrawShippingSpeedLights(UINT8 ubSelected)
01199 {
01200 
01201       if(ubSelected == 0)
01202             ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, gShippingSpeedAreas[0], gShippingSpeedAreas[1], gShippingSpeedAreas[0]+SHIPPING_SPEED_LIGHT_WIDTH,     gShippingSpeedAreas[1]+SHIPPING_SPEED_LIGHT_HEIGHT, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 0, 255, 0 ) ) );
01203       else
01204             ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, gShippingSpeedAreas[0], gShippingSpeedAreas[1], gShippingSpeedAreas[0]+SHIPPING_SPEED_LIGHT_WIDTH,     gShippingSpeedAreas[1]+SHIPPING_SPEED_LIGHT_HEIGHT, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 0, 0, 0 ) ) );
01205 
01206       if(ubSelected == 1)
01207             ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, gShippingSpeedAreas[2], gShippingSpeedAreas[3], gShippingSpeedAreas[2]+SHIPPING_SPEED_LIGHT_WIDTH,     gShippingSpeedAreas[3]+SHIPPING_SPEED_LIGHT_HEIGHT, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 0, 255, 0 ) ) );
01208       else
01209             ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, gShippingSpeedAreas[2], gShippingSpeedAreas[3], gShippingSpeedAreas[2]+SHIPPING_SPEED_LIGHT_WIDTH,     gShippingSpeedAreas[3]+SHIPPING_SPEED_LIGHT_HEIGHT, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 0, 0, 0 ) ) );
01210 
01211       if(ubSelected == 2)
01212             ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, gShippingSpeedAreas[4], gShippingSpeedAreas[5], gShippingSpeedAreas[4]+SHIPPING_SPEED_LIGHT_WIDTH,     gShippingSpeedAreas[5]+SHIPPING_SPEED_LIGHT_HEIGHT, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 0, 255, 0 ) ) );
01213       else
01214             ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, gShippingSpeedAreas[4], gShippingSpeedAreas[5], gShippingSpeedAreas[4]+SHIPPING_SPEED_LIGHT_WIDTH,     gShippingSpeedAreas[5]+SHIPPING_SPEED_LIGHT_HEIGHT, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 0, 0, 0 ) ) );
01215 
01216       InvalidateRegion(iScreenWidthOffset + 585, iScreenHeightOffset + 218, iScreenWidthOffset + 594, iScreenHeightOffset + 287);
01217       return(TRUE);
01218 }

01221 void SelectConfirmOrderRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
01222 { 
01223       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
01224       {
01225       }
01226       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
01227       {
01228             //Remove the items for Boby Rqys Inventory
01229             RemovePurchasedItemsFromBobbyRayInventory();
01230 
01231                   //delete the order
01232             memset(&BobbyRayPurchases, 0, sizeof(BobbyRayPurchaseStruct) * MAX_PURCHASE_AMOUNT);
01233             gubSelectedLight = 0;
01234             gfDestroyConfirmGrphiArea = TRUE;
01235             gubSelectedLight = 0;
01236 
01237             //Goto The homepage
01238             guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_BOBBY_R;
01239       
01240       } 
01241       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
01242       {
01243             //Remove the items for Boby Rqys Inventory
01244             RemovePurchasedItemsFromBobbyRayInventory();
01245 
01246             //delete the order
01247             memset(&BobbyRayPurchases, 0, sizeof(BobbyRayPurchaseStruct) * MAX_PURCHASE_AMOUNT);
01248             gubSelectedLight = 0;
01249             gfDestroyConfirmGrphiArea = TRUE;
01250             gubSelectedLight = 0;
01251       
01252       } 
01253 }
01254 
01255 
01256 BOOLEAN CreateDestroyBobbyRDropDown( UINT8 ubDropDownAction )
01257 {
01258       static UINT16 usHeight;
01259       static BOOLEAN fMouseRegionsCreated=FALSE;
01260 
01261       switch( ubDropDownAction )
01262       {
01263             case  BR_DROP_DOWN_NO_ACTION:
01264             {
01265 
01266             }
01267             break;
01268 
01269             case  BR_DROP_DOWN_CREATE:
01270             {
01271                   UINT8 i;
01272                   UINT16 usPosX, usPosY, usHeight;
01273                   UINT16 usTemp;
01274                   UINT16 usFontHeight = GetFontHeight( BOBBYR_DROPDOWN_FONT );
01275 
01276                   if( fMouseRegionsCreated )
01277                   {
01278                         gubDropDownAction = BR_DROP_DOWN_DESTROY;
01279 
01280                         break;
01281                   }
01282                   fMouseRegionsCreated = TRUE;
01283 
01284                   usPosX = BOBBYR_CITY_START_LOCATION_X;
01285                   usPosY = BOBBYR_CITY_START_LOCATION_Y;
01286                   for( i=0; i< BOBBYR_NUM_DISPLAYED_CITIES; i++)
01287                   {
01288                         MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSelectedDropDownRegion[i], usPosX, (UINT16)(usPosY+4), (UINT16)(usPosX+BOBBYR_DROP_DOWN_WIDTH-6), (UINT16)(usPosY+usFontHeight+7), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
01289                                                              CURSOR_WWW, SelectDropDownMovementCallBack, SelectDropDownRegionCallBack); 
01290                         MSYS_AddRegion(&gSelectedDropDownRegion[i]); 
01291                         MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gSelectedDropDownRegion[ i ], 0, i);
01292 
01293                         usPosY += usFontHeight + 2;
01294                   }
01295                   usTemp = BOBBYR_CITY_START_LOCATION_Y;
01296                   usHeight = usPosY - usTemp + 10;
01297 
01298 
01299                   //create the scroll bars regions
01300                   //up arrow
01301                   usPosX = BOBBYR_SCROLL_UP_ARROW_X;
01302                   usPosY = BOBBYR_SCROLL_UP_ARROW_Y;
01303                   for(i=0; i<2; i++)
01304                   {
01305                         MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSelectedUpDownArrowOnScrollAreaRegion[i], usPosX, usPosY, (UINT16)(usPosX+BOBBYR_SCROLL_ARROW_WIDTH), (UINT16)(usPosY+BOBBYR_SCROLL_ARROW_HEIGHT), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
01306                                                              CURSOR_WWW, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, SelectUpDownArrowOnScrollAreaRegionCallBack); 
01307                         MSYS_AddRegion(&gSelectedUpDownArrowOnScrollAreaRegion[i]); 
01308                         MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gSelectedUpDownArrowOnScrollAreaRegion[ i ], 0, i);
01309                         usPosX = BOBBYR_SCROLL_DOWN_ARROW_X;
01310                         usPosY = BOBBYR_SCROLL_DOWN_ARROW_Y;
01311                   }
01312 
01313                   //the scroll area itself
01314                   usPosX = BOBBYR_SCROLL_AREA_X;
01315                   usPosY = BOBBYR_SCROLL_UP_ARROW_Y + BOBBYR_SCROLL_ARROW_HEIGHT;
01316                   usHeight = BOBBYR_SCROLL_AREA_HEIGHT_MINUS_ARROWS / BOBBYR_ORDER_NUM_SHIPPING_CITIES;
01317                   for(i=0; i<BOBBYR_ORDER_NUM_SHIPPING_CITIES-1; i++)
01318                   {
01319                         MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSelectedScrollAreaDropDownRegion[i], usPosX, usPosY, (UINT16)(usPosX+BOBBYR_SCROLL_ARROW_WIDTH), (UINT16)(usPosY+usHeight), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH+1,
01320                                                              CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN, SelectScrollAreaDropDownMovementCallBack, SelectScrollAreaDropDownRegionCallBack); 
01321                         MSYS_AddRegion(&gSelectedScrollAreaDropDownRegion[i]); 
01322                         MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gSelectedScrollAreaDropDownRegion[ i ], 0, i);
01323                         usPosY += usHeight;
01324                   }
01325                   //put the last one down to cover the remaining area 
01326                   MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSelectedScrollAreaDropDownRegion[i], usPosX, usPosY, (UINT16)(usPosX+BOBBYR_SCROLL_ARROW_WIDTH), BOBBYR_SCROLL_DOWN_ARROW_Y, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH+1,
01327                                                        CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN, SelectScrollAreaDropDownMovementCallBack, SelectScrollAreaDropDownRegionCallBack); 
01328                   MSYS_AddRegion(&gSelectedScrollAreaDropDownRegion[i]); 
01329                   MSYS_SetRegionUserData( &gSelectedScrollAreaDropDownRegion[ i ], 0, i);
01330 
01331 
01332               MSYS_EnableRegion(&gSelectedCloseDropDownRegion); 
01333 
01334                   //disable the clear order and accept order buttons, (their rendering interferes with the drop down graphics)
01335               DisableButton(guiBobbyRClearOrder); 
01336 
01337 //FERAL
01338 //                if( IsAnythingPurchasedFromBobbyRayPage() )
01339 //                {
01340 //                      SpecifyDisabledButtonStyle( guiBobbyRAcceptOrder, DISABLED_STYLE_NONE );
01341 //                      DisableButton(guiBobbyRAcceptOrder); 
01342 //                }
01343             }
01344             break;
01345             
01346             case  BR_DROP_DOWN_DESTROY:
01347             {
01348                   UINT8 i;
01349 
01350                   if( !fMouseRegionsCreated )
01351                         break;
01352 
01353                   for( i=0; i< BOBBYR_NUM_DISPLAYED_CITIES; i++)
01354                     MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSelectedDropDownRegion[i]);
01355 
01356 
01357                   //destroy the scroll bars arrow regions
01358                   for( i=0; i< 2; i++)
01359                     MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSelectedUpDownArrowOnScrollAreaRegion[i]);
01360 
01361                   //destroy the scroll bars regions
01362                   for( i=0; i<BOBBYR_ORDER_NUM_SHIPPING_CITIES; i++)
01363                     MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSelectedScrollAreaDropDownRegion[i]);
01364 
01365                   //display the name on the title bar
01366                   ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, BOBBYR_SHIPPING_LOC_AREA_L_X, BOBBYR_SHIPPING_LOC_AREA_T_Y, BOBBYR_SHIPPING_LOC_AREA_L_X+175,    BOBBYR_SHIPPING_LOC_AREA_T_Y+BOBBYR_DROP_DOWN_HEIGHT, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 0, 0, 0 ) ) );
01367 
01368                   if( gbSelectedCity == -1 )
01369                         DrawTextToScreen( BobbyROrderFormText[BOBBYR_SELECT_DEST], BOBBYR_CITY_START_LOCATION_X+BOBBYR_CITY_NAME_OFFSET, BOBBYR_SHIPPING_LOC_AREA_T_Y+3, 0, BOBBYR_DROPDOWN_FONT, BOBBYR_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_SELEC_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED      );
01370                   else
01371                         DrawTextToScreen( *(BobbyROrderLocations[gbSelectedCity].psCityLoc), BOBBYR_CITY_START_LOCATION_X+BOBBYR_CITY_NAME_OFFSET, BOBBYR_SHIPPING_LOC_AREA_T_Y+3, 0, BOBBYR_DROPDOWN_FONT, BOBBYR_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_SELEC_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED  );
01372 
01373                   //disable the r\close regiuon
01374               MSYS_DisableRegion(&gSelectedCloseDropDownRegion); 
01375 
01376                   //enable the clear order and accept order buttons, (because their rendering interferes with the drop down graphics)
01377                   EnableButton(guiBobbyRClearOrder); 
01378 //FERAL
01379 //                if( IsAnythingPurchasedFromBobbyRayPage() )
01380 //                {
01381 //                      SpecifyDisabledButtonStyle( guiBobbyRAcceptOrder, DISABLED_STYLE_SHADED );
01382 //                  EnableButton(guiBobbyRAcceptOrder); 
01383 //                }
01384 
01385                   gfReDrawBobbyOrder = TRUE;
01386                   fMouseRegionsCreated  = FALSE;
01387                   gubDropDownAction = BR_DROP_DOWN_NO_ACTION;
01388             }
01389             break;
01390 
01391             case  BR_DROP_DOWN_DISPLAY:
01392             {
01393                   UINT8 i;
01394                   UINT16 usPosY, usPosX;
01395                   UINT16 usFontHeight = GetFontHeight( BOBBYR_DROPDOWN_FONT );
01396               HVOBJECT  hImageHandle;
01397               HVOBJECT  hArrowHandle;
01398 
01399                   //Display the background for the drop down window
01400                   ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, BOBBYR_CITY_START_LOCATION_X, BOBBYR_CITY_START_LOCATION_Y, BOBBYR_CITY_START_LOCATION_X+BOBBYR_DROP_DOWN_WIDTH,   BOBBYR_CITY_START_LOCATION_Y+BOBBYR_SCROLL_AREA_HEIGHT, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 0, 0, 0 ) ) );
01401 
01402                   //
01403                   // Place the border around the background
01404                   //
01405                   usHeight = BOBBYR_SCROLL_AREA_HEIGHT;
01406 
01407                   GetVideoObject(&hImageHandle, guiDropDownBorder);
01408 
01409                   usPosX = usPosY = 0;
01410                   //blit top & bottom row of images
01411                   for(i=10; i< BOBBYR_DROP_DOWN_WIDTH-10; i+=10)
01412                   {
01413                         //TOP ROW
01414                         BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hImageHandle, 1,i+BOBBYR_CITY_START_LOCATION_X, usPosY+BOBBYR_CITY_START_LOCATION_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
01415                         //BOTTOM ROW
01416                         BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hImageHandle, 6,i+BOBBYR_CITY_START_LOCATION_X, usHeight-10+6+BOBBYR_CITY_START_LOCATION_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
01417                   }
01418 
01419                   //blit the left and right row of images
01420                   usPosX = 0;
01421                   for(i=10; i< usHeight-10; i+=10)
01422                   {
01423                         BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hImageHandle, 3,usPosX+BOBBYR_CITY_START_LOCATION_X, i+BOBBYR_CITY_START_LOCATION_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
01424                         BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hImageHandle, 4,usPosX+BOBBYR_DROP_DOWN_WIDTH-4+BOBBYR_CITY_START_LOCATION_X, i+BOBBYR_CITY_START_LOCATION_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
01425                   }
01426 
01427                   //blt the corner images for the row
01428                   //top left
01429                   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hImageHandle, 0, 0+BOBBYR_CITY_START_LOCATION_X, usPosY+BOBBYR_CITY_START_LOCATION_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
01430                   //top right
01431                   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hImageHandle, 2, BOBBYR_DROP_DOWN_WIDTH-10+BOBBYR_CITY_START_LOCATION_X, usPosY+BOBBYR_CITY_START_LOCATION_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
01432                   //bottom left
01433                   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hImageHandle, 5, 0+BOBBYR_CITY_START_LOCATION_X, usHeight-10+BOBBYR_CITY_START_LOCATION_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
01434                   //bottom right
01435                   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hImageHandle, 7, BOBBYR_DROP_DOWN_WIDTH-10+BOBBYR_CITY_START_LOCATION_X, usHeight-10+BOBBYR_CITY_START_LOCATION_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
01436 
01437 
01438                   DrawSelectedCity( gbSelectedCity );
01439 
01440 
01441                   //display the scroll bars regions
01442                   ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, BOBBYR_SCROLL_AREA_X, BOBBYR_SCROLL_AREA_Y, BOBBYR_SCROLL_AREA_X+BOBBYR_SCROLL_AREA_WIDTH, BOBBYR_SCROLL_AREA_Y+BOBBYR_SCROLL_AREA_HEIGHT, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 0, 0, 0 ) ) );
01443 
01444                   //blt right bar of scroll area
01445                   usPosX = 0;
01446                   for(i=10; i< BOBBYR_SCROLL_AREA_HEIGHT-10; i+=10)
01447                   {
01448                         BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hImageHandle, 3,BOBBYR_SCROLL_AREA_X+BOBBYR_SCROLL_AREA_WIDTH-4, i+BOBBYR_CITY_START_LOCATION_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
01449                   }
01450 
01451                   //blit top row of images
01452                   for(i=0; i< BOBBYR_SCROLL_AREA_WIDTH; i+=10)
01453                   {
01454                         //TOP ROW
01455                         BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hImageHandle, 1,i+BOBBYR_SCROLL_AREA_X-10, BOBBYR_SCROLL_AREA_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
01456                         //BOTTOM ROW
01457                         BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hImageHandle, 6,i+BOBBYR_SCROLL_AREA_X-10, BOBBYR_SCROLL_AREA_Y-10+6+BOBBYR_SCROLL_AREA_HEIGHT, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
01458                   }
01459 
01460                   //top right
01461                   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hImageHandle, 2, BOBBYR_SCROLL_AREA_X+BOBBYR_SCROLL_AREA_WIDTH-10, BOBBYR_SCROLL_AREA_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
01462                   //bottom right
01463                   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hImageHandle, 7, BOBBYR_SCROLL_AREA_X+BOBBYR_SCROLL_AREA_WIDTH-10, BOBBYR_SCROLL_AREA_Y+BOBBYR_SCROLL_AREA_HEIGHT-10, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
01464 
01465                   //fix 
01466                   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hImageHandle, 4, BOBBYR_DROP_DOWN_WIDTH-4+BOBBYR_CITY_START_LOCATION_X, BOBBYR_CITY_START_LOCATION_Y+2, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
01467 
01468 
01469                   //get and display the up and down arrows
01470                   GetVideoObject(&hArrowHandle, guiGoldArrowImages);
01471                   //top arrow 
01472                   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hArrowHandle, 1, BOBBYR_SCROLL_UP_ARROW_X, BOBBYR_SCROLL_UP_ARROW_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
01473 
01474                   //top arrow 
01475                   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hArrowHandle, 0, BOBBYR_SCROLL_DOWN_ARROW_X, BOBBYR_SCROLL_DOWN_ARROW_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
01476 
01477                   //display the scroll rectangle
01478                   DrawGoldRectangle( gbSelectedCity );
01479 
01480 
01481               InvalidateRegion(LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y,LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_LR_Y);
01482             }
01483             break;
01484       }
01485 
01486       return(TRUE);
01487 }

01489 
01490 void SelectDropDownRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
01491 { 
01492       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
01493       {
01494       }
01495       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
01496       {
01497             UINT8 ubSelected = (UINT8)MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
01498             gbSelectedCity = ubSelected + gubCityAtTopOfList ;
01499 
01500             DrawSelectedCity( gbSelectedCity );
01501 
01502             gubDropDownAction = BR_DROP_DOWN_DESTROY;
01503       } 
01504 }
01505 
01506 void SelectActivateCityDroDownRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
01507 { 
01508       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
01509       {
01510       }
01511       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
01512       {
01513             gubDropDownAction = BR_DROP_DOWN_CREATE;
01514       } 
01515 }
01516 
01517 
01518 void SelectDropDownMovementCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 reason )
01519 {
01520       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
01521       {
01522             pRegion->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
01523             InvalidateRegion(pRegion->RegionTopLeftX, pRegion->RegionTopLeftY, pRegion->RegionBottomRightX, pRegion->RegionBottomRightY);
01524       }
01525       else if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_GAIN_MOUSE )
01526       {
01527             pRegion->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON ;
01528 
01529             gbSelectedCity = (UINT8)MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 ) + gubCityAtTopOfList;
01530 
01531             gubDropDownAction = BR_DROP_DOWN_DISPLAY;
01532 
01533             InvalidateRegion(pRegion->RegionTopLeftX, pRegion->RegionTopLeftY, pRegion->RegionBottomRightX, pRegion->RegionBottomRightY);
01534       }
01535 } 
01536 
01537 
01538 
01539 void DrawSelectedCity( UINT8 ubCityNumber )
01540 {
01541       UINT16 usPosY;
01542       UINT16 usFontHeight = GetFontHeight( BOBBYR_DROPDOWN_FONT );
01543       UINT8 i;
01544 
01545       //DEBUG: make sure it wont go over array bounds
01546       if( gubCityAtTopOfList+BOBBYR_NUM_DISPLAYED_CITIES > BOBBYR_ORDER_NUM_SHIPPING_CITIES )
01547             gubCityAtTopOfList = BOBBYR_ORDER_NUM_SHIPPING_CITIES - BOBBYR_NUM_DISPLAYED_CITIES - 1;
01548 
01549 
01550       //Display the list of cities
01551       usPosY = BOBBYR_CITY_START_LOCATION_Y + 5;
01552       for( i=gubCityAtTopOfList; i< gubCityAtTopOfList+BOBBYR_NUM_DISPLAYED_CITIES; i++)
01553       {
01554             DrawTextToScreen( *(BobbyROrderLocations[i].psCityLoc), BOBBYR_CITY_START_LOCATION_X+BOBBYR_CITY_NAME_OFFSET, usPosY, 0, BOBBYR_DROPDOWN_FONT, BOBBYR_ORDER_STATIC_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED );
01555             usPosY += usFontHeight + 2;
01556       }
01557 
01558       if( ubCityNumber != 255 )
01559             usPosY = (usFontHeight + 2) * (ubCityNumber - gubCityAtTopOfList) + BOBBYR_CITY_START_LOCATION_Y;
01560       else
01561             usPosY = (usFontHeight + 2) * (gubCityAtTopOfList) + BOBBYR_CITY_START_LOCATION_Y;
01562 
01563 
01564       //display the name in the list
01565       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, BOBBYR_CITY_START_LOCATION_X+4, usPosY+4, BOBBYR_CITY_START_LOCATION_X+BOBBYR_DROP_DOWN_WIDTH-4, usPosY+usFontHeight+6, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 200, 169, 87 ) ) );
01566 
01567       SetFontShadow(NO_SHADOW);     
01568       if( ubCityNumber == 255 )
01569             DrawTextToScreen( *(BobbyROrderLocations[ 0 ].psCityLoc), BOBBYR_CITY_START_LOCATION_X+BOBBYR_CITY_NAME_OFFSET, (UINT16)(usPosY+5), 0, BOBBYR_DROPDOWN_FONT, BOBBYR_FONT_BLACK, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED      );
01570       else
01571             DrawTextToScreen( *(BobbyROrderLocations[ubCityNumber].psCityLoc), BOBBYR_CITY_START_LOCATION_X+BOBBYR_CITY_NAME_OFFSET, (UINT16)(usPosY+5), 0, BOBBYR_DROPDOWN_FONT, BOBBYR_FONT_BLACK, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED   );
01572 
01573       SetFontShadow(DEFAULT_SHADOW);
01574 
01575       DisplayShippingLocationCity();
01576 
01577       if( guiBobbyRAcceptOrder != -1 )
01578       {
01579             //if there is anything to buy, dont disable the accept button
01580             if( IsAnythingPurchasedFromBobbyRayPage() && gbSelectedCity != -1 )
01581                   EnableButton( guiBobbyRAcceptOrder );
01582       }
01583 }
01584 
01585 void DisplayShippingLocationCity()
01586 {
01587       wchar_t     sTemp[40];
01588       UINT16 usPosY;
01589 
01590       //display the name on the title bar
01591       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, BOBBYR_SHIPPING_LOC_AREA_L_X, BOBBYR_SHIPPING_LOC_AREA_T_Y, BOBBYR_SHIPPING_LOC_AREA_L_X+175,    BOBBYR_SHIPPING_LOC_AREA_T_Y+BOBBYR_DROP_DOWN_HEIGHT, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 0, 0, 0 ) ) );
01592 
01593       //if there is no city selected
01594       if( gbSelectedCity == -1 )
01595             DrawTextToScreen( BobbyROrderFormText[BOBBYR_SELECT_DEST], BOBBYR_CITY_START_LOCATION_X+BOBBYR_CITY_NAME_OFFSET, BOBBYR_SHIPPING_LOC_AREA_T_Y+3, 0, BOBBYR_DROPDOWN_FONT, BOBBYR_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_SELEC_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED      );
01596       else
01597             DrawTextToScreen( *(BobbyROrderLocations[gbSelectedCity].psCityLoc), BOBBYR_CITY_START_LOCATION_X+BOBBYR_CITY_NAME_OFFSET, BOBBYR_SHIPPING_LOC_AREA_T_Y+3, 0, BOBBYR_DROPDOWN_FONT, BOBBYR_ORDER_DROP_DOWN_SELEC_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED  );
01598 
01599 
01600       DisplayShippingCosts( TRUE, 0, BOBBYR_ORDERGRID_X, BOBBYR_ORDERGRID_Y, -1 );
01601 
01602       if( gubDropDownAction == BR_DROP_DOWN_DISPLAY)
01603             return;
01604 
01605 
01606       //Display the shipping cost
01607       usPosY = BOBBYR_OVERNIGHT_EXPRESS_Y;
01608 
01609       wcscpy(sTemp, L"$0");
01610 
01611       if( gbSelectedCity != -1 )
01612       {
01613             swprintf( sTemp, L"%d", ( INT32 )(BobbyROrderLocations[gbSelectedCity].usOverNightExpress/GetWeightBasedOnMetricOption( 1 ) )  );
01614             InsertCommasForDollarFigure( sTemp );
01615             InsertDollarSignInToString( sTemp );
01616       }
01617 
01618       DrawTextToScreen(sTemp, BOBBYR_SHIPPING_SPEED_NUMBER_X, usPosY, BOBBYR_SHIPPING_SPEED_NUMBER_WIDTH, BOBBYR_DROPDOWN_FONT, BOBBYR_ORDER_DYNAMIC_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, RIGHT_JUSTIFIED  );
01619       usPosY +=BOBBYR_GRID_ROW_OFFSET;
01620 
01621       if( gbSelectedCity != -1 )
01622       {
01623             swprintf( sTemp, L"%d", ( INT32 )( BobbyROrderLocations[gbSelectedCity].us2DaysService / GetWeightBasedOnMetricOption( 1 ) ) );
01624             InsertCommasForDollarFigure( sTemp );
01625             InsertDollarSignInToString( sTemp );
01626       }
01627 
01628       DrawTextToScreen(sTemp, BOBBYR_SHIPPING_SPEED_NUMBER_X, usPosY, BOBBYR_SHIPPING_SPEED_NUMBER_WIDTH, BOBBYR_DROPDOWN_FONT, BOBBYR_ORDER_DYNAMIC_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, RIGHT_JUSTIFIED  );
01629       usPosY +=BOBBYR_GRID_ROW_OFFSET;
01630 
01631       if( gbSelectedCity != -1 )
01632       {
01633             swprintf( sTemp, L"%d", (INT32 )( BobbyROrderLocations[gbSelectedCity].usStandardService / GetWeightBasedOnMetricOption( 1 ) ) );
01634             InsertCommasForDollarFigure( sTemp );
01635             InsertDollarSignInToString( sTemp );
01636       }
01637 
01638       DrawTextToScreen(sTemp, BOBBYR_SHIPPING_SPEED_NUMBER_X, usPosY, BOBBYR_SHIPPING_SPEED_NUMBER_WIDTH, BOBBYR_DROPDOWN_FONT, BOBBYR_ORDER_DYNAMIC_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, RIGHT_JUSTIFIED  );
01639 }
01640 
01641 void SelectCloseDroDownRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
01642 { 
01643       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
01644       {
01645       }
01646       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
01647       {
01648             gubDropDownAction = BR_DROP_DOWN_DESTROY;
01649       } 
01650 }
01651 
01652 
01653 void RemovePurchasedItemsFromBobbyRayInventory()
01654 {
01655       INT16 i;
01656 
01657       for(i=0; i<MAX_PURCHASE_AMOUNT; i++)
01658       {
01659             //if the item was purchased
01660             if( BobbyRayPurchases[ i ].ubNumberPurchased )
01661             {
01662                   //if the item is used
01663                   if( BobbyRayPurchases[ i ].fUsed)
01664                   {
01665                         //removee it from Bobby Rays Inventory
01666                         if( ( LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayUsedInventory[ BobbyRayPurchases[ i ].usBobbyItemIndex ].ubQtyOnHand - BobbyRayPurchases[ i ].ubNumberPurchased) > 0 )
01667                               LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayUsedInventory[ BobbyRayPurchases[ i ].usBobbyItemIndex ].ubQtyOnHand -= BobbyRayPurchases[ i ].ubNumberPurchased;
01668                         else
01669                               LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayUsedInventory[ BobbyRayPurchases[ i ].usBobbyItemIndex ].ubQtyOnHand = 0;
01670                   }
01671 
01672                   //else the purchase is new
01673                   else
01674                   {
01675                         //removee it from Bobby Rays Inventory
01676                         if( (LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayInventory[ BobbyRayPurchases[ i ].usBobbyItemIndex ].ubQtyOnHand - BobbyRayPurchases[ i ].ubNumberPurchased) > 0 )
01677                               LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayInventory[ BobbyRayPurchases[ i ].usBobbyItemIndex ].ubQtyOnHand -= BobbyRayPurchases[ i ].ubNumberPurchased;
01678                         else
01679                               LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayInventory[ BobbyRayPurchases[ i ].usBobbyItemIndex ].ubQtyOnHand = 0;
01680                   }
01681             }
01682       }
01683       gfRemoveItemsFromStock = FALSE;
01684 }
01685 
01686 
01687 BOOLEAN IsAnythingPurchasedFromBobbyRayPage()
01688 {
01689       UINT16 i;
01690       BOOLEAN     fReturnType = FALSE;
01691 
01692       for(i=0; i<MAX_PURCHASE_AMOUNT; i++)
01693       {
01694             //if the item was purchased
01695             if( BobbyRayPurchases[ i ].ubNumberPurchased )
01696             {
01697                   fReturnType = TRUE;
01698             }
01699       }
01700       return( fReturnType );
01701 }

01714 
01715 void SelectScrollAreaDropDownRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
01716 { 
01717       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
01718       {
01719       }
01720       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
01721       {
01722             UINT8 ubCityNum = (UINT8)MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
01723 
01724             if( ubCityNum < gbSelectedCity )
01725             {
01726                   gbSelectedCity--;
01727                   if( gbSelectedCity < gubCityAtTopOfList )
01728                         gubCityAtTopOfList--;
01729             }
01730 
01731             if( ubCityNum > gbSelectedCity )
01732             {
01733                   gbSelectedCity++;
01734                   if( ( gbSelectedCity - gubCityAtTopOfList ) >= BOBBYR_NUM_DISPLAYED_CITIES )
01735                         gubCityAtTopOfList++;
01736             }
01737 
01738             gubDropDownAction = BR_DROP_DOWN_DISPLAY;
01739       } 
01740       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_REPEAT)
01741       {
01742             UINT8 ubCityNum = (UINT8)MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
01743 
01744             pRegion->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON ;
01745 
01746             if( ubCityNum < gbSelectedCity )
01747             {
01748                   gbSelectedCity--;
01749                   if( gbSelectedCity < gubCityAtTopOfList )
01750                         gubCityAtTopOfList--;
01751             }
01752 
01753             if( ubCityNum > gbSelectedCity )
01754             {
01755                   gbSelectedCity++;
01756                   if( ( gbSelectedCity - gubCityAtTopOfList ) >= BOBBYR_NUM_DISPLAYED_CITIES )
01757                         gubCityAtTopOfList++;
01758             }
01759 
01760             gubDropDownAction = BR_DROP_DOWN_DISPLAY;
01761 
01762             InvalidateRegion(pRegion->RegionTopLeftX, pRegion->RegionTopLeftY, pRegion->RegionBottomRightX, pRegion->RegionBottomRightY);
01763       }
01764 }
01765 
01766 
01767 void SelectScrollAreaDropDownMovementCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 reason )
01768 {
01769       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
01770       {
01771             pRegion->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
01772             InvalidateRegion(pRegion->RegionTopLeftX, pRegion->RegionTopLeftY, pRegion->RegionBottomRightX, pRegion->RegionBottomRightY);
01773       }
01774       else if (reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_GAIN_MOUSE )
01775       {
01776             if( gfLeftButtonState )
01777             {
01778                   UINT8 ubCityNum = (UINT8)MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
01779 
01780                   pRegion->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON ;
01781 
01782                   if( ubCityNum < gbSelectedCity )
01783                   {
01784                         gbSelectedCity = ubCityNum;
01785                         if( gbSelectedCity < gubCityAtTopOfList )
01786                               gubCityAtTopOfList = gbSelectedCity;
01787                   }
01788 
01789                   if( ubCityNum > gbSelectedCity )
01790                   {
01791                         gbSelectedCity = ubCityNum;
01792                         if( ( gbSelectedCity - gubCityAtTopOfList ) >= BOBBYR_NUM_DISPLAYED_CITIES )
01793                               gubCityAtTopOfList = gbSelectedCity - BOBBYR_NUM_DISPLAYED_CITIES + 1;
01794                   }
01795 
01796                   gubDropDownAction = BR_DROP_DOWN_DISPLAY;
01797 
01798                   InvalidateRegion(pRegion->RegionTopLeftX, pRegion->RegionTopLeftY, pRegion->RegionBottomRightX, pRegion->RegionBottomRightY);
01799             }
01800       }
01801 } 
01802 
01803 
01804 void SelectUpDownArrowOnScrollAreaRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
01805 { 
01806       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
01807       {
01808       }
01809       else if( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP || iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_REPEAT )
01810       {
01811             UINT8 ubUpArrow = (UINT8)MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
01812 
01813             if( ubUpArrow )
01814             {
01815                   if( gbSelectedCity < BOBBYR_ORDER_NUM_SHIPPING_CITIES-1 )
01816                   {
01817                         gbSelectedCity++;
01818                   }
01819 
01820                   if( ( gbSelectedCity - gubCityAtTopOfList ) >= BOBBYR_NUM_DISPLAYED_CITIES )
01821                   {
01822                         gubCityAtTopOfList++;
01823                   }
01824             }
01825             else
01826             {
01827                   if( gbSelectedCity != -1 )
01828                   {
01829                         if( gbSelectedCity > 0 )
01830                               gbSelectedCity--;
01831 
01832                         if( gbSelectedCity < gubCityAtTopOfList )
01833                               gubCityAtTopOfList--;
01834                   }
01835             }
01836 
01837             gubDropDownAction = BR_DROP_DOWN_DISPLAY;
01838       } 
01839 }

01841 
01842 void DrawGoldRectangle( INT8 bCityNum )
01843 {
01844   UINT32 uiDestPitchBYTES;
01845   UINT8      *pDestBuf;
01846       UINT16 usWidth, usTempHeight, usTempPosY, usHeight;
01847       UINT16 usPosX, usPosY;
01848 
01849       UINT16 temp;
01850 
01851       if( bCityNum == -1 )
01852             bCityNum = 0;
01853 
01854       usTempPosY = BOBBYR_SCROLL_UP_ARROW_Y;
01855       usTempPosY += BOBBYR_SCROLL_ARROW_HEIGHT;
01856       usPosX = BOBBYR_SCROLL_AREA_X;
01857       usWidth = BOBBYR_SCROLL_AREA_WIDTH - 5;
01858       usTempHeight = ( BOBBYR_SCROLL_AREA_HEIGHT - 2 * BOBBYR_SCROLL_ARROW_HEIGHT ) - 8;
01859       
01860       usHeight = usTempHeight / (BOBBYR_ORDER_NUM_SHIPPING_CITIES+1);
01861 
01862       usPosY = usTempPosY + (UINT16)( ( ( BOBBYR_SCROLL_AREA_HEIGHT - 2 * BOBBYR_SCROLL_ARROW_HEIGHT ) /  (FLOAT)(BOBBYR_ORDER_NUM_SHIPPING_CITIES +1) ) * bCityNum );
01863 
01864       temp = BOBBYR_SCROLL_AREA_Y + BOBBYR_SCROLL_AREA_HEIGHT - BOBBYR_SCROLL_ARROW_HEIGHT - usHeight - 1;
01865 
01866       if( usPosY >= temp )
01867             usPosY = BOBBYR_SCROLL_AREA_Y + BOBBYR_SCROLL_AREA_HEIGHT - BOBBYR_SCROLL_ARROW_HEIGHT - usHeight - 5;
01868 
01869       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, BOBBYR_SCROLL_AREA_X, usPosY, BOBBYR_SCROLL_AREA_X+usWidth,  usPosY+usHeight, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 186, 165, 68 ) ) );
01870 
01871       //display the line
01872       pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES );               
01873       SetClippingRegionAndImageWidth( uiDestPitchBYTES, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT);
01874 
01875   // draw the gold highlite line on the top and left
01876       LineDraw(FALSE, usPosX, usPosY, usPosX+usWidth, usPosY, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 235, 222, 171 ) ), pDestBuf);
01877       LineDraw(FALSE, usPosX, usPosY, usPosX, usPosY+usHeight, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 235, 222, 171 ) ), pDestBuf);
01878 
01879   // draw the shadow line on the bottom and right
01880       LineDraw(FALSE, usPosX, usPosY+usHeight, usPosX+usWidth, usPosY+usHeight, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 65, 49, 6 ) ), pDestBuf);
01881       LineDraw(FALSE, usPosX+usWidth, usPosY, usPosX+usWidth, usPosY+usHeight, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 65, 49, 6 ) ), pDestBuf);
01882       
01883       // unlock frame buffer
01884       UnLockVideoSurface( FRAME_BUFFER );
01885 }
01886 
01887 
01888 UINT32      CalcCostFromWeightOfPackage( UINT8  ubTypeOfService )
01889 {
01890       UINT32      uiTotalWeight = 0;
01891       UINT16      usStandardCost=0;
01892       UINT32      uiTotalCost=0;
01893 
01894       if( gbSelectedCity == -1 )
01895       {
01896             // shipping rates unknown until destination selected
01897             return(0);
01898       }
01899 
01900       //Get the package's weight
01901       uiTotalWeight = CalcPackageTotalWeight();
01902       
01903 /*    for(i=0; i<MAX_PURCHASE_AMOUNT; i++)
01904       {
01905             //if the item was purchased
01906             if( BobbyRayPurchases[ i ].ubNumberPurchased )
01907             {
01908                   //add the current weight to the total
01909                   uiTotalWeight += Item[ BobbyRayPurchases[ i ].usItemIndex ].ubWeight * BobbyRayPurchases[ i ].ubNumberPurchased;
01910             }
01911       }
01912 */
01913       Assert ( ubTypeOfService < 3);
01914 
01915       switch( ubTypeOfService )
01916       {
01917             case 0:
01918                   usStandardCost = BobbyROrderLocations[gbSelectedCity].usOverNightExpress;
01919                   break;
01920             case 1:
01921                   usStandardCost = BobbyROrderLocations[gbSelectedCity].us2DaysService;
01922                   break;
01923             case 2:
01924                   usStandardCost = BobbyROrderLocations[gbSelectedCity].usStandardService;
01925                   break;
01926 
01927             default:
01928                   usStandardCost = 0;
01929       }
01930 
01931       //Get the actual weight ( either in lbs or metric )
01932 ///   usStandardCost = (UINT16) GetWeightBasedOnMetricOption( usStandardCost );
01933 
01934       //if the total weight is below a set minimum amount ( 2 kg )
01935       if( uiTotalWeight < MIN_SHIPPING_WEIGHT )
01936       {
01937             //bring up the base cost
01938             uiTotalWeight = MIN_SHIPPING_WEIGHT;
01939       }
01940 
01941       uiTotalCost = (UINT32)( ( uiTotalWeight / (FLOAT)10 ) * usStandardCost + .5 );
01942 
01943       return( uiTotalCost );
01944 }

01952             MemFree( LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayOrdersOnDeliveryArray );
01953             LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayOrdersOnDeliveryArray = NULL;
01954       }
01955 */

01957 }
01958 
01959 void ShutDownBobbyRNewMailOrders()
01960 {
01961       if( gpNewBobbyrShipments != NULL )
01962       {
01963             MemFree( gpNewBobbyrShipments );
01964             gpNewBobbyrShipments = NULL;
01965       }
01966       giNumberOfNewBobbyRShipment = 0;
01967 }
01968 
01969 INT8 CalculateOrderDelay( UINT8 ubSelectedService )
01970 {
01971       INT8 bDaysAhead;
01972 
01973       //get the length of time to receive the shipment                  
01974       if( ubSelectedService == 0 )
01975       {
01976             bDaysAhead = OVERNIGHT_EXPRESS;
01977       }
01978       else if( ubSelectedService == 1 )
01979       {
01980             bDaysAhead = TWO_BUSINESS_DAYS;
01981       }
01982       else if( ubSelectedService == 2 )
01983       {
01984             bDaysAhead = STANDARD_SERVICE;
01985       }
01986       else
01987       {
01988             bDaysAhead = 0;
01989       }
01990       
01991       if ( gMercProfiles[ SAL ].bLife == 0 )
01992       {
01993             // Sal is dead, so Pablo is dead, so the airport is badly run
01994             // CJC comment: this seems really extreme!! maybe delay by 1 day randomly but that's it!
01995             bDaysAhead += (UINT8) Random( 5 ) + 1;
01996       }
01997 
01998       return( bDaysAhead );
01999 }

02017                   LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayOrdersOnDeliveryArray = MemRealloc( LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayOrdersOnDeliveryArray, sizeof( BobbyRayOrderStruct ) * LaptopSaveInfo.usNumberOfBobbyRayOrderItems );

02067 */
02068 
02069       }
02070

02072       AddTransactionToPlayersBook(BOBBYR_PURCHASE, 0, GetWorldTotalMin(), -giGrandTotal);
02073 
02074       //display the confirm order graphic
02075       gfDrawConfirmOrderGrpahic = TRUE;
02076 
02077       //Get rid of the city drop dowm, if it is being displayed
02078       gubDropDownAction = BR_DROP_DOWN_DESTROY;
02079 
02080       MSYS_EnableRegion(&gSelectedConfirmOrderRegion); 
02081       gfRemoveItemsFromStock = TRUE;
02082 
02083       gbSelectedCity = -1;
02084 }

02087 {

02089 //    UINT8 cnt;
02090       INT8        bDaysAhead;
02091

02093       memset( Temp, 0, sizeof( BobbyRayPurchaseStruct ) * MAX_PURCHASE_AMOUNT );

02097       if( LaptopSaveInfo.usNumberOfBobbyRayOrderItems <= LaptopSaveInfo.usNumberOfBobbyRayOrderUsed )

02100             LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayOrdersOnDeliveryArray = MemRealloc( LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayOrdersOnDeliveryArray, sizeof( BobbyRayOrderStruct ) * LaptopSaveInfo.usNumberOfBobbyRayOrderItems );

02102                   return;

02105       }

02124

02137       LaptopSaveInfo.usNumberOfBobbyRayOrderUsed++;
02138 */
02139       bDaysAhead = CalculateOrderDelay( 2 ) + 2;
02140

02142 //    AddFutureDayStrategicEvent( EVENT_BOBBYRAY_PURCHASE, (8 + Random(4) ) * 60, cnt, bDaysAhead );
02143 
02144       //add the delivery      ( weight is not needed as it will not be displayed )
02145       AddNewBobbyRShipment( Temp, BR_DRASSEN, bDaysAhead, FALSE, 0 );
02146 }

02159 {
02160       memset(&BobbyRayPurchases, 0, sizeof(BobbyRayPurchaseStruct) * MAX_PURCHASE_AMOUNT);
02161       gubSelectedLight = 0;
02162       gfReDrawBobbyOrder = TRUE;
02163       gbSelectedCity = -1;
02164       gubCityAtTopOfList = 0;
02165

02172 
02173 
02174 UINT32      CalcPackageTotalWeight()
02175 {
02176       UINT16      i;
02177       UINT32      uiTotalWeight=0;
02178 
02179       //loop through all the packages
02180       for(i=0; i<MAX_PURCHASE_AMOUNT; i++)
02181       {
02182             //if the item was purchased
02183             if( BobbyRayPurchases[ i ].ubNumberPurchased )
02184             {
02185                   //add the current weight to the total
02186                   uiTotalWeight += Item[ BobbyRayPurchases[ i ].usItemIndex ].ubWeight * BobbyRayPurchases[ i ].ubNumberPurchased;
02187             }
02188       }
02189 
02190       return( uiTotalWeight );
02191 }
02192 
02193 
02194 void DisplayPackageWeight( )
02195 {
02196       CHAR16            zTemp[32];
02197       UINT32       uiTotalWeight = CalcPackageTotalWeight();
02198 //    FLOAT             fWeight = (FLOAT)(uiTotalWeight / 10.0);
02199 
02200       //Display the 'Package Weight' text
02201       DrawTextToScreen(BobbyROrderFormText[ BOBBYR_PACKAGE_WEIGHT ], BOBBYR_PACKAXGE_WEIGHT_X+8, BOBBYR_PACKAXGE_WEIGHT_Y+4, BOBBYR_PACKAXGE_WEIGHT_WIDTH, BOBBYR_ORDER_STATIC_TEXT_FONT, BOBBYR_ORDER_STATIC_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
02202 
02203       //Display the weight
02204 //    swprintf( zTemp, L"%3.1f %s", fWeight, pMessageStrings[ MSG_KILOGRAM_ABBREVIATION ] );
02205       swprintf( zTemp, L"%3.1f %s", ( GetWeightBasedOnMetricOption( uiTotalWeight ) / 10.0f ), GetWeightUnitString() );
02206       DrawTextToScreen( zTemp, BOBBYR_PACKAXGE_WEIGHT_X+3, BOBBYR_PACKAXGE_WEIGHT_Y+4, BOBBYR_PACKAXGE_WEIGHT_WIDTH, BOBBYR_ORDER_STATIC_TEXT_FONT, BOBBYR_ORDER_STATIC_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, RIGHT_JUSTIFIED);
02207 }
