02210 
02211 void BtnBobbyRGotoShipmentPageCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
02212 {
02213       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
02214       {
02215             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
02216             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
02217       }
02218       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
02219       {
02220             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
02221             guiCurrentLaptopMode  = LAPTOP_MODE_BOBBYR_SHIPMENTS;
02222             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
02223       }
02224       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
02225       {
02226             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
02227             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
02228       }
02229 }

02232 BOOLEAN CreateBobbyRayOrderTitle()
02233 {
02234   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
02235 
02236             // load BobbyRayTitle graphic and add it
02237       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
02238       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\BobbyRayTitle.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
02239       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiBobbyRayTitle));
02240 
02241       //the link to home page from the title
02242       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSelectedTitleLinkRegion, BOBBYR_BOBBY_RAY_TITLE_X, BOBBYR_BOBBY_RAY_TITLE_Y, (BOBBYR_BOBBY_RAY_TITLE_X + BOBBYR_BOBBY_RAY_TITLE_WIDTH), (UINT16)(BOBBYR_BOBBY_RAY_TITLE_Y + BOBBYR_BOBBY_RAY_TITLE_HEIGHT), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
02243                                            CURSOR_WWW, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, SelectTitleLinkRegionCallBack);
02244       MSYS_AddRegion( &gSelectedTitleLinkRegion ); 
02245 
02246       return( TRUE );
02247 }

02264 
02265 BOOLEAN AddNewBobbyRShipment( BobbyRayPurchaseStruct *pPurchaseStruct, UINT8 ubDeliveryLoc, UINT8 ubDeliveryMethod, BOOLEAN fPruchasedFromBobbyR, UINT32 uiPackageWeight )
02266 {
02267       INT32 iCnt;
02268       INT32 iFoundSpot = -1;
02269       UINT8 ubItemCount=0;
02270       UINT8 i;
02271       INT8  bDaysAhead=0;
02272 //    UINT32      uiPackageWeight;
02273 //    gpNewBobbyrShipments = NULL;
02274 //    giNumberOfNewBobbyRShipment = 0;
02275 
02276       //loop through and see if there is a free spot to insert the new order
02277       for( iCnt=0; iCnt<giNumberOfNewBobbyRShipment; iCnt++ )
02278       {
02279             if( !gpNewBobbyrShipments->fActive )
02280             {
02281                   iFoundSpot = iCnt;
02282                   break;
02283             }
02284       }
02285 
02286       if( iFoundSpot == -1 )
02287       {
02288             //increment the number of spots used
02289             giNumberOfNewBobbyRShipment++;
02290 
02291             //allocate some more memory
02292             gpNewBobbyrShipments = (NewBobbyRayOrderStruct *) MemRealloc( gpNewBobbyrShipments, sizeof( NewBobbyRayOrderStruct ) * giNumberOfNewBobbyRShipment );
02293 
02294             iFoundSpot = giNumberOfNewBobbyRShipment - 1;
02295       }
02296 
02297       //memset the memory
02298       memset( &gpNewBobbyrShipments[ iFoundSpot ], 0, sizeof( NewBobbyRayOrderStruct ) );
02299 
02300       gpNewBobbyrShipments[ iFoundSpot ].fActive = TRUE;
02301       gpNewBobbyrShipments[ iFoundSpot ].ubDeliveryLoc = ubDeliveryLoc;
02302       gpNewBobbyrShipments[ iFoundSpot ].ubDeliveryMethod = ubDeliveryMethod;
02303 
02304       if( fPruchasedFromBobbyR )
02305             gpNewBobbyrShipments[ iFoundSpot ].fDisplayedInShipmentPage = TRUE;
02306       else
02307             gpNewBobbyrShipments[ iFoundSpot ].fDisplayedInShipmentPage = FALSE;
02308 
02309       //get the apckage weight, if the weight is "below" the minimum, use the minimum
02310       if(  uiPackageWeight < MIN_SHIPPING_WEIGHT )
02311       {
02312             gpNewBobbyrShipments[ iFoundSpot ].uiPackageWeight = MIN_SHIPPING_WEIGHT;
02313       }
02314       else
02315       {
02316             gpNewBobbyrShipments[ iFoundSpot ].uiPackageWeight = uiPackageWeight;
02317       }
02318 
02319       gpNewBobbyrShipments[ iFoundSpot ].uiOrderedOnDayNum = GetWorldDay();
02320 
02321       //count the number of purchases
02322       ubItemCount = 0;
02323       for(i=0; i<MAX_PURCHASE_AMOUNT; i++)
02324       {
02325             //if the item was purchased
02326             if( pPurchaseStruct[ i ].ubNumberPurchased )
02327             {
02328                   // copy the new data into the order struct
02329                   memcpy( &gpNewBobbyrShipments[ iFoundSpot ].BobbyRayPurchase[ ubItemCount ], &pPurchaseStruct[i], sizeof( BobbyRayPurchaseStruct ) );
02330 
02331                   //copy the purchases into the struct that will be added to the queue
02332 //                memcpy(&LaptopSaveInfo.BobbyRayOrdersOnDeliveryArray[ cnt ].BobbyRayPurchase[ ubCount ] , &BobbyRayPurchases[i],  sizeof(BobbyRayPurchaseStruct));
02333                   ubItemCount++;
02334             }
02335       }
02336 
02337       gpNewBobbyrShipments[ iFoundSpot ].ubNumberPurchases = ubItemCount;
02338 
02339 
02340       //get the length of time to receive the shipment                  
02341       if( fPruchasedFromBobbyR )
02342             bDaysAhead = CalculateOrderDelay( ubDeliveryMethod );
02343       else
02344             bDaysAhead = ubDeliveryMethod;
02345             
02346 
02347       //AddStrategicEvent( EVENT_BOBBYRAY_PURCHASE, uiResetTimeSec, cnt);
02348       AddFutureDayStrategicEvent( EVENT_BOBBYRAY_PURCHASE, (8 + Random(4) ) * 60, iFoundSpot, bDaysAhead );
02349 
02350       return( TRUE );
02351 }
02352 
02353 UINT16      CountNumberOfBobbyPurchasesThatAreInTransit()
02354 {
02355       UINT16      usItemCount=0;
02356       INT32       iCnt;
02357 
02358       for( iCnt=0; iCnt<giNumberOfNewBobbyRShipment; iCnt++ )
02359       {
02360             if( gpNewBobbyrShipments[iCnt].fActive )
02361             {
02362                   usItemCount++;
02363             }
02364       }
02365 
02366       return( usItemCount );
02367 }

02370 
02371 BOOLEAN NewWayOfSavingBobbyRMailOrdersToSaveGameFile( HWFILE hFile )
02372 {
02373       INT32       iCnt;
02374       UINT32      uiNumBytesWritten;
02375 
02376       //Write the number of orders
02377       FileWrite( hFile, &giNumberOfNewBobbyRShipment, sizeof( INT32 ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
02378       if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( INT32 ) )
02379       {
02380             FileClose( hFile );
02381             return( FALSE );
02382       }
02383 
02384       //loop through and save all the mail order slots
02385       for( iCnt=0; iCnt<giNumberOfNewBobbyRShipment; iCnt++ )
02386       {
02387             //Write the order
02388             FileWrite( hFile, &gpNewBobbyrShipments[iCnt], sizeof( NewBobbyRayOrderStruct ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
02389             if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( NewBobbyRayOrderStruct ) )
02390             {
02391                   FileClose( hFile );
02392                   return( FALSE );
02393             }
02394       }
02395 
02396       return( TRUE );
02397 }
02398 
02399 
02400 
02401 BOOLEAN NewWayOfLoadingBobbyRMailOrdersToSaveGameFile( HWFILE hFile )
02402 {
02403       INT32       iCnt;
02404       UINT32      uiNumBytesRead;
02405 
02406       //clear out the old list
02407       ShutDownBobbyRNewMailOrders();
02408 
02409 
02410       //Read the number of orders
02411       FileRead( hFile, &giNumberOfNewBobbyRShipment, sizeof( INT32 ), &uiNumBytesRead );
02412       if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( INT32 ) )
02413       {
02414             FileClose( hFile );
02415             return( FALSE );
02416       }
02417 
02418       if ( giNumberOfNewBobbyRShipment == 0 )
02419       {
02420             gpNewBobbyrShipments = NULL;
02421       }
02422       else
02423       {
02424             //Allocate memory for the list
02425             gpNewBobbyrShipments = (NewBobbyRayOrderStruct *) MemAlloc( sizeof( NewBobbyRayOrderStruct ) * giNumberOfNewBobbyRShipment );
02426             if( gpNewBobbyrShipments == NULL )
02427             {
02428                   Assert(0);
02429                   return(FALSE );
02430             }
02431 
02432             //loop through and load all the mail order slots
02433             for( iCnt=0; iCnt<giNumberOfNewBobbyRShipment; iCnt++ )
02434             {
02435                   //Read the order
02436                   FileRead( hFile, &gpNewBobbyrShipments[iCnt], sizeof( NewBobbyRayOrderStruct ), &uiNumBytesRead );
02437                   if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( NewBobbyRayOrderStruct ) )
02438                   {
02439                         FileClose( hFile );
02440                         return( FALSE );
02441                   }
02442             }
02443       }
02444 
02445       return( TRUE );
02446 }
